content:
{"updates": [{"pattern": ".*", "replacement": "**🧠 Trusting AI to Guide My Career & Finding a New Path. 🚀**  
  
After nearly **two years of job searching**, I’ve realized that the traditional approach just isn’t working. **Endless applications, networking, and waiting for responses—it’s frustrating, inefficient, and honestly feels outdated.**  
  
### **🔹 What I’m Looking For & How You Can Help**  
I am actively seeking **opportunities in AI-driven business transformation, analytics, and automation.** Given the evolving job market, I am open to **entry-level roles ($100K+)** in:  
✅ **AI Implementation & Strategy** (AI Adoption Consultant, AI Transformation Lead)  
✅ **Business Intelligence & Data-Driven Strategy** (BI Manager, Strategy & Analytics Manager)  
✅ **Revenue & Growth Optimization** (Revenue Operations Analyst, AI-Driven Sales Enablement)  
  
I bring experience in **e-commerce, SaaS, and operational analytics**—helping businesses optimize efficiency, automation, and AI adoption.  
  
📌 **If you know of any opportunities or can introduce me to someone in these spaces, I would love to connect.** Referrals, insights, and even just a quick chat would be hugely helpful. **Let’s break the outdated job search system together.**  
  
### **🔹 Why AI Told Me to Focus on Social Media Engagement**  
When I asked AI how to improve my job search, **it made something very clear: Traditional job searching is dead.**  
  
Instead of just applying to jobs, AI recommended:  
🔹 **Learning how to implement AI**—not just use it, but actively build/configure AI solutions  
🔹 **Engaging on social media** to widen my network and visibility  
🔹 **Documenting & sharing my insights** to create inbound opportunities  
  
So, I’m committing to **learning and sharing the process of AI adoption & automation,** and I’ll be posting weekly about my progress, insights, and career strategies.  
  
### **🔹 How This Led Me to an Unusual Experiment**  
While researching business ideas (including a pet-related franchise), I asked AI **what ELSE I could do to generate income.** One of its responses?  
  
👉 **“Leverage your dog’s unique talents on social media.”**  
  
At first, I laughed. But then I thought—**why not?** My dog **Chewy** (a.k.a. *The Wide Retriever*) has an **insane ability to catch footballs, a signature mohawk, and the perfect personality for viral content.**  
  
So, I’m following AI’s advice and testing whether **strategic AI-driven social media growth** can actually work.  
  
### **🔹 Here’s the Plan**  
📌 **I’ll continue sharing AI-powered job search & career strategies.**  
📌 **I’ll document my journey into AI implementation and automation.**  
📌 **I’ll also test AI’s social media strategies for growth—with Chewy as the first experiment.**  
📌 **And if you’re into dogs doing cool stuff, give these accounts a follow.** (Would appreciate the support!)  
  
### **🐶 Follow Chewy’s Journey:**  
📍 **Instagram:** [Insert IG handle]  
📍 **TikTok:** [Insert TikTok handle]  
📍 **YouTube Shorts:** [Insert YouTube handle]  
  
🚀 **I’m treating this as an AI-driven career experiment—let’s see where it leads.** If nothing else, at least Chewy is having fun.  
  
Would love to hear from others—**have you ever taken AI’s career advice? What’s the most unexpected thing it has suggested?**  
  
_(Attaching a video of Chewy doing what he does best: making catches & looking cool.)_"}]}
